title: Questys Solutions Board Names Mike Myers as Next CEO
text:
Submitted by admin on 10/16/2015 @ 6:15 AM Companies mentioned in this article: Questys Solutions 
IRVINE, Calif., Oct. 16, 2015 /PRNewswire-iReach/ -- Questys Solutions , the leading provider of cost effective departmental applications and enterprise content management solutions, today announced the appointment of Mike Myers as the new CEO. Mike has been a key member of the Questys Solutions executive leadership team since 2012 and will take over from Rod Anderson, who has led the firm with distinction for three years. Anderson moved Questys Solutions products, solutions, services, and customer satisfaction to levels not seen before in the company's history. He will remain on the board and continue to invest in the future growth of the company. 
Logo - http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnh/20151015/277576LOGO 
"Mike is the right person for the job," said Rod Anderson, former Questys CEO, "He has demonstrated his dedication, perseverance, vision, operational and leadership skills over the last three years. He is a good colleague and friend and I am personally delighted to be handing over the reins to such an outstanding leader." 
Mike Myers has been instrumental in the designing, developing, marketing, selling, and delivering of solutions that make Questys customers more productive everyday. His track record and experience in helping customers and employees solve problems, combined with his ability to execute and accelerate software companies, make him a perfect candidate for the CEO position at Questys. 
"Mike is known as a decisive, collaborative leader that builds high performing teams," said Michael Richard, CFO for Questys. 
"I am excited and humbled by this opportunity," said Mike Myers. "I am committed to our vision, listening to our customers' needs, and mission to help them solve problems and be more productive. I look forward to continuing to work with this team to realize the full operational and financial potential at Questys. I appreciate the trust that the Board has in our management team to achieve our goals." 
About 
Since 1980, Questys Solutions has been enabling people to be more productive by transforming enterprise and departmental content and record centric processes. Questys helps organizations solve back office and front office challenges associated with capturing unstructured information , OCRing, categorizing, finding, sharing, and securing content , documents , records and Images. Tens of thousands of users from organizations around the world -- including federal, state and local agencies and Fortune 1000 companies -- use Questys to streamline HR, finance, contracts, cases, legislative agendas with business process workflow to reduce costs and increase efficiency and interoperability.
